doc.title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
doc.author: Henrik Lundblad
doc.excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Red Sand Planet Sightseeing by Henrik Lundblad

main.head: Red Sand Planet Sightseeing
main.p: Henrick Lundblad is a Swedish art director, concept artist, and industrial designer. As a concept artist, his main focus is to develop concepts that drive storytelling and set the style, look, and mood in games and films. His work includes designing everything from key art to character designs, props, full sets, and cinematic storyboarding.
